episode of.title: D.B. Cooper: The Real Story (TV Series 2018â€“ )

-1.plot: It's considered one of America's most notorious unsolved mysteries. Many still remember the night of November 24, 1971 when we learned a man named D.B. Cooper hijacked the NWA flight 305. He demanded $200,000 cash and 4 parachutes. Once he received his demand, he released all the passengers at SeaTac airport.

imdb.plot outline: D.B. Cooper is the infamous skyjacker who boarded a Boeing 727 in Portland, Oregon on Thanksgiving Eve, 1971, and escaped with a $200,000 ransom after jumping from 10,000 feet. D.B. Cooper's identity was never discovered, and his fate has remained a mystery for 46 years. Until now. Walter Reca is D.B. Cooper. This is his story.
